description.narrative: Programme, planning , monitoring, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

sector.narrative: Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Programme monitoring addressed two areas: "implementation monitoring" and "results monitoring." In the first, the CO successfully designed, timely implemented and reported the HACT assurance plan, and moved forward in the development, monitoring and reporting of the PSEA system and action plan.;In the second, "results monitoring", the CO maintained the development and report of indicators, baselines, targets and measurement methodologies to assess and report the country programme´s contribution to outputs and outcomes for children. This applied for both the last and current CPDs. Also, technical guidance was provided for planning the next CPD, CEP, CPMP and cooperation programmes with CSO.; | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/01/2021

title.narrative: Completion rate of the Annual HACT Assurance Plan in the reporting year, Percent
